ai-tha-ap342:1.2_0: Mātali, I fell at that very sad:
ai-tha-ap342:2.3_0: with a hundred thousand people making a thousand sacrifices
ai-tha-ap342:4.1_0: Having seen (that), the Lord of the god,
ai-tha-ap342:4.3_0: incinerated the stakes, having cut the mindful,
ai-tha-ap342:5.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap342:6.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap342:6.3_0: by the power of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap342:6.4_0: they dropped the bundle of drums.
ai-tha-ap342:7.4_0: I went to the company of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap342:8.2_0: a sentient being is what is meant.
ai-tha-ap342:8.3_0: sixty leagues all over the leagues.
ai-tha-ap342:9.1_0: I thousand times, the lord of gods,
ai-tha-ap342:9.2_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap342:9.3_0: and five-fold succession and seven months,
ai-tha-ap342:12.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap342:13.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap342:13.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap342:15.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Padumavatī.
ai-tha-ap342:16.1_0: having lifted up the factor of (good) conduct, the ten Elders
ai-tha-ap342:17.1_0: The fourth sub-chapter on smells is finished.
ai-tha-ap342:20.2_0: with the verses destroyed in all the Vedas:
